pageContext.claim: “Cryin’ Chuck Schumer was on a late night show using a false talking point over & over again. 'We don't have enough testing,' he would repeat, when he knows we have done a great job on Testing, just like we have on Ventilators and everything else.”
pageContext.analysis: In the first several weeks of the coronavirus pandemic, the U.S. testing apparatus was hardly working. There continue to be supply chain issues with tests and many public health officials have said that the country has done far too few tests to be reopening public spaces.
